name: CubeMaze (Saltbox Games, DustedHam)
description:
This game was made as part of a small game jam with friends. 

I found it was good to play for small breaks at work when I needed to not think about code for a minute or two, so I decided to polish it up a bit and release it.

hopefully you find it as relaxing as I have.

Difficulty can be scaled from 1-52.

Camera:w a s d q eMove:up down left right

(Note: Mac and Linux builds are untested, let me know if they're not working properly.)
